protein.specific_function: Might act as an E3 ubiquitin-protein ligase, or as part of E3 complex, which accepts ubiquitin from specific E2 ubiquitin- conjugating enzymes such as UBE2D1 or UBE2N and then transfers it to substrates. In the absence of an external substrate, it can catalyze self-ubiquitination
